metadata.name: LuckyPiggy
metadata.description: 此卡用以纪念 WePiggy 跨链部署的第一步：登陆 OKExChain。“欧气”源于 OKExChain。欧气满满，即“运气满满”。持有此卡可获得由 WePiggy 加持的“欧气满满，大吉大利”状态。This card is issued to commemorate the first step of WePiggy's cross-chain deployment plan: OKExChain. "LuckyPiggy" means, OKExChain brings piggy big luck. Holder of this NFT will be blessed by WePiggy with the buff of "Super Lucky".总量(Amount)：298 品级(Level)：史诗(Epic)
